item.title: About Me
item.description: Skilled Rust developer with 1+ year of experience in software development. Strong understanding of Rust programming language and its ecosystem. Proficient in creating efficient and scalable applications. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills. Seeking opportunities to contribute to challenging projects as a Rust Developer. Skills: Rust programming language Software development Object-oriented programming Data structures and algorithms Web development (A few work with React and Lit frameworks) Cryptography API design and implementation Version control (Git) Experience: Created many pet-project on github.
